statements: SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_usage > 100;
SELECT timestamp, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, energy_usage, timestamp FROM energy_consumption WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_usage > 100
SELECT user_id, energy_usage, timestamp FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY energy_usage DESC
SELECT user_id, energy_usage, timestamp FROM energy_consumption WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-03-31'
SELECT AVG(energy_usage) AS avg_usage FROM energy_consumption WHERE user_id = 2
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, energy_consumed FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, energy_units, timestamp FROM energy_transactions WHERE energy_units > 100;
SELECT user_id, SUM(energy_units) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, AVG(energy_units) AS average_energy_consumed FROM energy_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING AVG(energy_units) > 50;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, energy_consumed FROM users WHERE user_id < 100 ORDER BY energy_consumed ASC;
SELECT users.username, SUM(energy_units) AS total_energy FROM users JOIN energy_transactions ON users.user_id = energy_transactions.user_id GROUP BY users.username;
SELECT username, energy_units, timestamp FROM users JOIN energy_transactions ON users.user_id = energy_transactions.user_id WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT username, energy_consumed FROM users WHERE energy_consumed > 500 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_energy_consumption;
SELECT user_id, energy_consumed FROM user_energy_consumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, energy_consumed FROM user_energy_consumption WHERE energy_consumed > 100;
SELECT user_id, energy_consumed FROM user_energy_consumption WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY energy_consumed ASC;
SELECT AVG(energy_consumed) AS avg_consumption FROM user_energy_consumption;
SELECT user_id, energy_consumed, timestamp FROM user_energy_consumption WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT energy_consumed, timestamp, user_id FROM user_energy_consumption WHERE energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM user_energy_consumption WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01 00:00:00'
SELECT user_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM user_energy_consumption GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_energy_consumed DESC

SELECT user_id, AVG(energy_consumed) AS avg_energy_consumed FROM user_energy_consumption WHERE timestamp >= '2021-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01' GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY avg_energy_consumed DESC
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_name, energy_consumption FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT meter_location, energy_reading, timestamp FROM energy_meters ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_logs GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_name, bill_amount, billing_date FROM users JOIN energy_billing ON users.user_id = energy_billing.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_name, energy_consumption FROM users;
SELECT * FROM energy_meters WHERE energy_reading > 1000;
SELECT meter_location, energy_reading FROM energy_meters WHERE timestamp >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_logs GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE energy_consumption > 100;
SELECT * FROM user_energy_records WHERE consumed_energy <= 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, provider_name, consumed_energy FROM user_energy_records JOIN energy_providers ON user_energy_records.provider_id = energy_providers.provider_id;
SELECT user_id, SUM(consumed_energy) AS total_energy_consumed FROM user_energy_records GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, energy_consumption FROM users WHERE energy_consumption > 100;
SELECT provider_name FROM energy_providers WHERE provider_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, provider_id, consumed_energy FROM user_energy_records ORDER BY consumed_energy DESC;
SELECT user_id, provider_id, cost, timestamp FROM billing_history WHERE cost > 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
